title: Sofa and Table
description: Simple model of a sofa and a table used for my project 'Malam Pengabdian'.

title: Moonlight Greatsword
description: A great sword model, referencing 'Moonlight Greatsword' from the video game 'Dark Souls 2'.

title: Capybara Chillin'
description: A render of capybaras relaxing in and around a steaming hot tub. Created all the models myself.

title: 3D Zeppelin Model
description: A 3D model of a vintage commercial airship used during and after WWI. Referencing 'Graf Zeppelin' Airship

title: Mira the Dog
description: Low poly model of Mira from Silent Hill 2. Modeled, Textured and rendered using Blender by myself

title: Dorm Room
description: Layout for a level in my personal first person horror game project (WIP). All models were modeled by me.

title: Barong Mask
description: Model of Barong mask. Used in my horror project 'Malam Pengabdian'
